lemma strengthen_pre:
 "\<lbrakk> \<forall>z s. P' z s \<longrightarrow> P z s; C\<turnstile> {P}c{Q}  \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> C\<turnstile> {P'}c{Q}"
lemma MGT_lemma: "\<forall>p. C \<tturnstile> {MGT(CALL p)}  \<Longrightarrow>  C \<tturnstile> {MGT c}"
lemma MGT_body: "(P, CALL p, Q) = MGT (CALL pa) \<Longrightarrow> C \<tturnstile> {MGT (body p)} \<Longrightarrow> C \<turnstile> {P} body p {Q}"

goal (1 subgoal):

txt\<open>\noindent As before, we prove a generalization of @{prop"C |\<Turnstile> D"},
namely @{prop"\<forall>n. C |\<Turnstile>_n D"}, by induction on @{prop"C \<tturnstile> D"}, with an
induction on @{term n} in the @{term CALL} case.\<close>

                          \<forall>s t z.
                             (\<exists>n. s -c-n\<rightarrow>
                                 t) \<longrightarrow>

definition MGT :: "com \<Rightarrow> state assn \<times> com \<times> state assn" where
  [simp]: "MGT c = (\<lambda>z s. z = s, c, \<lambda>z t. z -c\<rightarrow> t)"

lemma strengthen_pre:
 "\<lbrakk> \<forall>z s. P' z s \<longrightarrow> P z s; C\<turnstile> {P}c{Q}  \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> C\<turnstile> {P'}c{Q}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>{} \<tturnstile> {MGT c}; \<Turnstile> {P} c {Q}\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> {} \<turnstile> {P} c {Q}

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Turnstile> {P} c {Q} \<Longrightarrow>
    \<forall>s t.
       (\<forall>z.
           z = s \<longrightarrow> z -c\<rightarrow> t) \<longrightarrow>
       (\<forall>z. P z s \<longrightarrow> Q z t)
lemma MGT_lemma: "\<forall>p. C \<tturnstile> {MGT(CALL p)}  \<Longrightarrow>  C \<tturnstile> {MGT c}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>p. C \<tturnstile> {MGT (CALL p)} \<Longrightarrow>
    C \<tturnstile> {MGT c}

lemma MGT_body: "(P, CALL p, Q) = MGT (CALL pa) \<Longrightarrow> C \<tturnstile> {MGT (body p)} \<Longrightarrow> C \<turnstile> {P} body p {Q}"

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<forall>(P, c, Q)\<in>{mgt. \<exists>p. mgt = MGT (CALL p)}.
       \<exists>p. c = CALL p
 2. {mgt. \<exists>p. mgt = MGT (CALL p)} \<tturnstile>
    {(P, b, Q).
     \<exists>p.
        (P, CALL p, Q) \<in> {mgt. \<exists>p. mgt = MGT (CALL p)} \<and>
        b = body p}

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {mgt. \<exists>p. mgt = MGT (CALL p)} \<tturnstile>
    {(P, b, Q).
     \<exists>p.
        (P, CALL p, Q) \<in> {mgt. \<exists>p. mgt = MGT (CALL p)} \<and>
        b = body p}

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>(P, c, Q)
             \<in>{(P, b, Q).
                   \<exists>p.
                      (P, CALL p, Q)
                      \<in> {mgt. \<exists>p. mgt = MGT (CALL p)} \<and>
                      b = body p}.
       {mgt. \<exists>p. mgt = MGT (CALL p)} \<turnstile> {P} c {Q}

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b p pa.
       (a, CALL p, b) = MGT (CALL pa) \<Longrightarrow>
       {mgt. \<exists>p. mgt = MGT (CALL p)} \<turnstile> {a} body p {b}

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a b p pa.
       {mgt. \<exists>p. mgt = MGT (CALL p)} \<tturnstile> {MGT (body p)}

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):

       \<forall>p. {mgt. \<exists>p. mgt = MGT (CALL p)} \<tturnstile>
          {MGT (CALL p)}

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):

       \<forall>p.
          {mgt.
           \<exists>p.
              mgt = ((=), CALL p, \<lambda>z. exec z (CALL p))} \<turnstile>
          {(=)} CALL p {\<lambda>z. exec z (CALL p)}
